name: Re:Call (itch)
description:
----- THIS GAME IS GAMEPAD ONLY ----- HEAVY USE OF WHITE NOISE AND SOME VIBRATION ----

Re:Call is a minimalist puzzle platformer with a key focus on learning from your past, as well as thinking outside the box. The simple graphics hide a complex puzzle game, with easy to control and versatile movement, as well as interactive puzzle elements.

Yeah I'm over selling it. I enjoyed making this game. It was hard finding an aesthetic that worked well with the gameplay and concept, so I just went simple. Unfortunately due to the nature of the controls, which should be explained in game but there is an attached cheatsheat, it is gamepad only. I might make a future mouse and keyboard one if I have time

Have fun!
